price: (Iyo Kafuur) ni isoko y’amazi (yo mu ijuru) abagaragu ba Allah bazanywaho, ikazajya ivubura amazi menshi (bakayerekeza aho bashaka),
arabic: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ʿaynan yashrabu bihā ʿibādu al-lahi yufajjirūnahā tafjīran
